articles.title: Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani is set to throw a grand wedding for his son. Here's what to know - The Associated Press
articles.description: In March, Asia’s richest man Mukesh Ambani threw a three-day prenuptial bash for his son that included a 1,200-person guest list, including former world leaders, tech tycoons and Bollywood’s megastars, and a performance by renowned singer Rihanna. It was only…
articles.content: NEW DELHI (AP) In March, Asias richest man Mukesh Ambani threw a three-day prenuptial bash for his son that included a 1,200-person guest list, including former world leaders, tech tycoons and Bollyw… [+5963 chars]

articles.title: First Asus ROG NUCs feature Intel CPUs and discrete Nvidia RTX GPUs - TechSpot
articles.description: Asus agreed to build its own NUC PCs under a non-exclusive agreement with Intel, and the original line of mini PCs is now evolving further by merging...
articles.content: Bottom line: Intel ceased to develop new NUC small form factor systems in 2023, with Asus taking over to advance the platform with updated designs and hardware components. Now, the company is ready t… [+2268 chars]
